Posts.EditableText: How do you mimic a Continue... from a Wait command in the Walkthrough steps?
Posts.HTML: How do you mimic a Continue... from a Wait command in the Walkthrough steps?

Posts.EditableText:
I am pretty sure you can do this, but cannot remember how. I suggest you record a walkthrough, and then see what  it includes.

Then do please post the results here so we all know for next time!
